    #include <math.h>
    #include <stdio.h>
    #include <cassert>
    #include <algorithm>
    # define pi 3.14159
	using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
    long long int a,b,n;
    char c;
    scanf("%lld%c%lld",&a,&c,&b);
	assert(max(a,b)<=100000000);
     
     
    if(c=='!')
    {
    n=a;
    long long int i,n1=0;
    if(n==0||n==1)
    n1=1;
    else
    n1=floor((log(2*pi*n)/2+n*(log(n)-1))/log(10))+1;
     
    printf("%lld\n",n1);
    }
    else if(c=='*')
    {
    int x=log10(a)+log10(b)+1;
    printf("%d\n",x);
    }
    else if(c=='/')
    {
    int x=log10(a)-log10(b)+1;
    printf("%d\n",x);
    }
    else if(c=='^')
    {
    int x=b*log10(a)+1;
    printf("%d\n",x);
    }
    //printf("%d %d %c",a,b,c);
    return 0;
    }
